title: MB Test
MB1 test

MB1 test
text:
You can access the Many Babies 1 data programmatically using the Redivis API for R or Python.

RPython



Install the redivis-r package:

devtools::install_github("redivis/redivis-r")

Generate and set an API token.
Access the data:

library(redivis)

user <- redivis::user("datapages")
dataset <- user$dataset("Many Babies 1")
table <- dataset$table("02_validated_output")

# Load table as tidyverse tibble
df <- table$to_tibble()
View documentation



Install the redivis-python client library:

pip install --upgrade redivis

Generate and set an API token.
Access the data:

import redivis

user = redivis.user("datapages")
dataset = user.dataset("Many Babies 1")
table = dataset.table("02_validated_output")

# Load table as a dataframe
df = table.to_pandas_dataframe()
View documentation
